title: Munich must confront the Iranian threat before it reaches Europe
summary_full: Europe is preparing for the war it can see. It risks overlooking the one that may be forming – driven by Tehran's military buildup and its accelerating alignment with Russia
summary_public: Europe is preparing for the war it can see. It risks overlooking the one that may be forming – driven by Tehran's military buildup and its accelerating alignment with Russia

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: Iranian threat before it reaches Europe
